pinText: This one time, at band camp, I saw a ghost and it was very spooky.

pinTitle: I think I found Casper ya'll
pinText: He was friendly but honestly pretty annoying and I left shortly after meeting him.

pinTitle: Spotted an old ghostly figure bearing a strong resemblance to Henry Kissinger outside capitol hill after dark.
pinText: Wikipedia reveals he is 100 and still alive. Not sure what he was doing out of bed so late.

pinTitle: Weird shadowy figure at the end of my bed - I think it wanted to sell me something.
pinText: Kinda weird the way it stands there all night trying to speak with me but no words come out. Probably gonna have to report this to the Ghostbusters.
